description.value:
A series of holo-projectors are embedded into the hood and frame of the vehicle, which allows one to control an external lightsource that covers the entire car.

These lights can be programmed in many ways, whether its based on speed, a built-in soundsystem, or associated with the driver's holoskin. These are controllable through synapses or within the vehicle itself.

When active, the holo-photonics can grant a +1 status bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion} depending on context, while also acting as a means to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} those attempts, using the driver or whoever can control the holo-photonics to make the aid check.
